it: Price pressures |    A self-service gas station in Songpa District, western Seoul, charges 1,978 won ($1.59) per liter of gasoline Tuesday, which is cheaper than Seoul s average price of 2,086 won per liter. Local gasoline prices have been rising for an eighth consecutive week as Russia s invasion of Ukraine drove up the price of crude oil.[YONHAP]    |https://news.naver.com/main/read.naver?mode=LS2D&mid=shm&sid1=101&sid2=263&oid=640&aid=0000022255
